prompts: Create a powerful fighting-type Pokemon with a sleek, muscular build and aggressive stance.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, featuring dark and gray colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines elegance and ferocity, with striking black and yellow accents.
Generate a unique Pokemon design inspired by martial arts, showcasing fluid movements and dark hues.
Make a fierce bipedal Pokemon that stands out with its menacing appearance and sharp claws.
Give me a Pokemon with a combination of fighting and dark types, emphasizing its stealthy nature.
Design a legendary Pokemon that represents the spirit of combat, featuring intricate details and a bold color palette.
